subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Shahar Peer used the same blueprint to dispose of Agnieszka Radwanska that Radwanska had used to dispatch Maria Sharapova, playing aggressively and attacking the second serve.
snippet: Shahar Peer used the same blueprint to dispose of Agnieszka Radwanska that Radwanska had used to dispatch Maria Sharapova, playing aggressively and attacking the second serve.
